com.vmware.vapi.protocol.server.rpc.http

Interface Endpoint

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SslEndpoint
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpEndpoint, HttpsEndpoint

    public interface Endpoint
    An HTTP server (host, port, protocol) triple plus connector specific configuration

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Endpoint.EndpointType
      Describe the endpoint's I/O connector type
      static class  Endpoint.Protocol
      Describes the endpoint's protocol

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the endpoint's host.

      Default valule is 200000 ms

      Get the number of thread dedicated to accepting incoming connections.

      Returns the endpoint's port number.

      Set number of connection requests that can be queued up before the operating system starts to send rejections.

      Set the endpoint connector I/O type (like blocking or NIO).

      Set the maximum Idle time for a connection, which roughly translates to the Socket.setSoTimeout(int) call but depends on the application server used and how it is configured.

      Set the number of thread dedicated to accepting incoming connections.

      • getNumAcceptors

        Get the number of thread dedicated to accepting incoming connections.
        Returns:
        thread number

      • setNumAcceptors

        void setNumAcceptors(int acceptors)
        Set the number of thread dedicated to accepting incoming connections.
        Parameters:
        acceptors - thread number. Defaults to 1

      • getAcceptQueueSize

        int getAcceptQueueSize()
        Get number of connection requests that can be queued up before the operating system starts to send rejections.
        Returns:
        max number of queued requests

      • setAcceptQueueSize

        void setAcceptQueueSize(int acceptQueueSize)
        Set number of connection requests that can be queued up before the operating system starts to send rejections.
        Parameters:
        acceptQueueSize - max number of queued requests. Defaults to 0. For the semantics see backlog parameter in ServerSocket.bind(java.net.SocketAddress, int)

      • setMaxIdleTime

        void setMaxIdleTime(int maxIdleTime)
        Set the maximum Idle time for a connection, which roughly translates to the Socket.setSoTimeout(int) call but depends on the application server used and how it is configured. The max idle time is applied:
        • When waiting for a new request to be received on a connection
        • When reading the headers and content of a request
        • When writing the headers and content of a response

        This value MUST be bigger than the keep alive period on the client.

        Default value is 200000 ms

        Parameters:
        maxIdleTime - The maxIdleTime to set.

      • getMaxIdleTime

        int getMaxIdleTime()
        Default valule is 200000 ms
        Returns:
        Returns the maxIdleTime.

      • setEndpointType

        void setEndpointType(Endpoint.EndpointType type)
        Set the endpoint connector I/O type (like blocking or NIO). Default is Endpoint.EndpointType.BLOCKING.
        Parameters:
        type - the I/O type to use

      • getEndpointType

        Endpoint.EndpointType getEndpointType()
        Get the endpoint connector I/O type.
        Returns:
        EndpointType representing the type
